B

Bullet - Class in com.mycompany.pewpewgame.objects
The Bullet GameObject is the projectile the player fires to damage the enemies.
Bullet(int, int, Orientation) - Constructor for class com.mycompany.pewpewgame.objects.Bullet
The Bullet inherits its position and orientation from the player.

C

checkForBullet(GameObject) - Method in class com.mycompany.pewpewgame.controllers.CollisionController
Checks for collisions if GameObject is of type Bullet and adds findings to colls ArrayList.
checkForCollisions(GameObject) - Method in class com.mycompany.pewpewgame.controllers.CollisionController
Master collision checker method for covering all GameObjects.
checkForEnemy(GameObject) - Method in class com.mycompany.pewpewgame.controllers.CollisionController
Checks for collisions if GameObject is of type Enemy and adds findings to colls ArrayList.
Collision - Class in com.mycompany.pewpewgame.objects
Collision object to document collisions each frame.
Collision(GameObject) - Constructor for class com.mycompany.pewpewgame.objects.Collision
Collisions are given to GameObjects and have their target GameObject saved in the collisionWith to identify both parties involved.
collision - Variable in class com.mycompany.pewpewgame.objects.GameObject
 
CollisionController - Class in com.mycompany.pewpewgame.controllers
This class detects and handles collisions between GameObject instances.
CollisionController(EnemyController, GameController) - Constructor for class com.mycompany.pewpewgame.controllers.CollisionController
The constructor requires the EnemyController and the GameController in order to access the values needed.

D

damageEnemy(GameObject) - Method in class com.mycompany.pewpewgame.controllers.EnemyController
This method damages a given GameObject, decreasing its hp attribute by 1.
damagePlayer() - Method in class com.mycompany.pewpewgame.controllers.GameController
Causes damage to the player object by decrementing the hp attribute.

E

Enemy - Class in com.mycompany.pewpewgame.objects
The Enemy GameObject are the objects that will try to kill the player.
Enemy(int, int) - Constructor for class com.mycompany.pewpewgame.objects.Enemy
 
EnemyAI - Class in com.mycompany.pewpewgame.controllers
The AI class updates the orientation of every enemy to face the player and selects the direction based on the greater X or Y distance.
EnemyAI(EnemyController, Player) - Constructor for class com.mycompany.pewpewgame.controllers.EnemyAI
The constructor also initializes the ThreadPoolExecutor and starts the AI decision timer.
EnemyController - Class in com.mycompany.pewpewgame.controllers
The EnemyController handles the Enemy GameObjects, spawning and destroying them.
EnemyController(GameController) - Constructor for class com.mycompany.pewpewgame.controllers.EnemyController
Starts a thread for spawning enemies every x seconds.

This is the master controller of the game logic.
GameController(Player) - Constructor for class com.mycompany.pewpewgame.controllers.GameController
The constructor needs a player instance and then initializes the controllers of more specific tasks.
GameObject - Class in com.mycompany.pewpewgame.objects
The parent GameObject class from which other GameObjects inherit most of their attributes and methods.
GameObject(int) - Constructor for class com.mycompany.pewpewgame.objects.GameObject
Creating an object with just HP given.

The master logic update function.
